## TelegramNotificationRuleBase.parseMode property

Parse mode of the message text per https://core.telegram.org/bots/api\#formatting-options. Defaults to "MarkdownV2".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
parseMode?: 'MarkdownV2' | 'HTML' | 'Markdown';
```
